Bo Hwang is an artist and writer working in poetry and movement. Recent works include: “abalone,” a poetry performance, object, and chapbook (forthcoming Counterpath 2025); Night Laps, a poetry book and finalist for Wendy's Subway's 2024 Open Reading, judged by Bhanu Kapil; and Squat Practice, an essay-poem collection on tropical fecundity and density as coverage, which was a finalist for the 2024 Essay Press Chapbook Contest.
